requirement.en: Shuffle 2 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Shuffle 2-7 monsters with different names from your opponent's Graveyard into their Deck. Then, if you shuffled 6 or more monsters by this effect, you can shuffle 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster from your opponent's field into the owner's Deck.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
